author: Hugo R. Esslinn
description: A very 'wet' but wonderfully Dry Martini which demands an olive, not a twist. Before you start - Craddock calls for it to be shaken, but it's better stirred. Shaking tends to suit Martinis with a low vermouth ratio.
name: Dry Martini (1:1 ratio) Fifty-Fifty

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
